name: JanKenUp!
description:
How high can you go? Get on the JanKenUP elevator! and check it out.

✊ Play rock, paper or scissors while riding an elevator with no maximum floor.

🖐 Single player: Unlock all the characters, beat your records and get all the available achievements.

✌ Online mode: Become the best player in the world or defeat your friends in private tournaments
